vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Ναασσών, ὁ indecl. (Heb. נַחְשׁוֹן),
Naasson: Mat.1:4, Luk.3:32.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Israel before the Monarchy, first mentioned at Exo.6.23;
son of: Amminadab (H5992);
brother of: Elisheba (H0472);
father of: Salmon (H8007)
§ Nahshon, "small viper"
Naasson, (Proper name), indeclinable, Mt. 1:4; Lk. 3:32*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
拿順 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "法師"
基督的祖先
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
拿顺 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "法师"
基督的祖先
